companyInfo: Boston University - CIDAR Lab --- Software Engineer Intern ---   June 2021-Aug 2021
jobContent: Research: develop software & programs applied to synthetic biology; contribute to website components of plasmid visualization.
Develop software to analyze sequences (plasmids, RNA, protein) to meet IGSC standards; screen and identify potentially dangerous sequences.
Using Vue, writing several key components to lab infrastructure.

companyInfo: XENON Corporation ---  Engineer team  --- Nov 2019 - Apr 2021
jobContent: Develop test protocols for different biological challenges.
